Title: Open Consortium Linux workshop
Text: The Open Consortium network held its second workshop 'Computer Skills for Biological Research' at the University of Brussels from 22-26 October 2012. Open Consortium researchers developed proficiency in GNU/Linux through guided analysis of biological data.
Link: New EU-funded project investigates embryonic stem-cell division
